DisputeRequest(address,uint256,uint256,u.details: To be emitted when a dispute is created to link the correct meta-evidence to the disputeID.

params._arbitrableDisputeID: The identifier of the dispute in the Arbitrable contract.
params._externalDisputeID: An identifier created outside Kleros by the protocol requesting arbitration.
params._templateId: The identifier of the dispute template. Should not be used with _templateUri.
params._templateUri: The URI to the dispute template. For example on IPFS: starting with '/ipfs/'. Should not be used with _templateId.

DisputeTemplate(uint256,string,string).details: To be emitted when a new dispute template is created.

params._templateId: The identifier of the dispute template.
params._templateTag: An optional tag for the dispute template, such as "registration" or "removal".

Ruling(address,uint256,uint256).details: To be raised when a ruling is given.

params._disputeID: The identifier of the dispute in the Arbitrator contract.

params._governor: The address of the new governor.

params._arbitrator: Target global arbitrator for any disputes.

createDisputeForTemplate(bytes,string,ui.details: Calls createDispute function of the specified arbitrator to create a dispute. Note that we don’t need to check that msg.value is enough to pay arbitration fees as it’s the responsibility of the arbitrator contract.

params._arbitratorExtraData: Extra data for the arbitrator of the dispute.

returns.disputeID: Dispute id (on arbitrator side) of the created dispute.

createDisputeForTemplateUri(bytes,string.details: Calls createDispute function of the specified arbitrator to create a dispute. Note that we don’t need to check that msg.value is enough to pay arbitration fees as it’s the responsibility of the arbitrator contract.

params._arbitratorExtraData: Extra data for the arbitrator of the dispute.
params._disputeTemplateUri: The URI to the dispute template. For example on IPFS: starting with '/ipfs/'.

returns.disputeID: Dispute id (on arbitrator side) of the created dispute.

rule(uint256,uint256).details: To be called by the arbitrator of the dispute, to declare the winning ruling.

params._externalDisputeID: ID of the dispute in arbitrator contract.
params._ruling: The ruling choice of the arbitration.

devdoc.title: DisputeResolver DisputeResolver contract adapted for V2 from https://github.com/kleros/arbitrable-proxy-contracts/blob/master/contracts/ArbitrableProxy.sol.
